FuncDef:
The crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter command configures the parameters used in the algorithm to calculate CRC error packet ratio.
The crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter realtime-factor command specifies the number of the template for factors affecting the algorithm used to calculate the CRC error packet ratio.
The undo crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter command restores the default parameters used in the algorithm to calculate CRC error packet ratio.
By default, the value of sample-window-factor is 50, the value of child-window-max-number is 50, the value of child-window-alarm-number is 5, the value of child-window-resume-number is 30, the value of template-number is 5.

ParaDef.Info:
Maximum number of child windows.
The value is an integer in the range 10 to 100. By default, the value is 50.

Minimum number of child windows to generate an alarm.
The value is an integer in the range 1 to 100. By default, the value is 5.

Minimum number of child windows to clear an alarm.
The value is an integer in the range 1 to 100. By default, the value is 30.

Sample window factor.
The value is an integer in the range 10 to 100. By default, the value is 50.

Number of the template for factors affecting the algorithm used to calculate the CRC error packet ratio.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 10. The default value is 5.

Examples: [~HUAWEI-GigabitEthernet1/1/0/0] trap-threshold crc-error packet-error-ratio alarm-threshold 1 3 resume-threshold 1 4 trigger-lsp
Warning: The implementation of this command will affect the CRC-PER detection. Please ensure that all parameters are confirmed by HUAWEI engineers. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
Warning: The implementation of this command will affect the CRC-PER detection. Please ensure that all parameters are confirmed by HUAWEI engineers. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you run the trap-threshold crc-error packet-error-ratio command to set the alarm thresholds for the CRC error packet ratio, the system calculates the CRC error packet ratio based on an algorithm. To adjust this algorithm so that the result is more accurate, run the crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter command to configure the parameters of this algorithm.
The crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter realtime-factor command specifies the number of the template for factors affecting the algorithm used to calculate the CRC error packet ratio. This template contains factors such as the time attenuation coefficient and interval for CRC error packet ratio calculation. A larger template number indicates higher reliability and slower CRC error packet ratio calculation.
Prerequisites
Before running this command, you must run the trap-threshold crc-error packet-error-ratio command in the interface view. Otherwise, an error message is displayed.
The undo trap-threshold crc-error command is run in the interface view.
Configuration Impact
The detection algorithm for CRC-PER alarms is affected. Ensure that these parameters are confirmed by Huawei engineers before configuring this command.
Precautions
The trap-threshold crc-error packet-error-ratio command must be run before the crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter command is configured.The trap-threshold crc-error packet-error-ratio and crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter commands must be run before the crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter realtime-factor command is configured.If the undo trap-threshold crc-error packet-error-ratio command is run to cancel the CRC error packet rate detection function, the crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter and crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter realtime-factor commands are also canceled.
It is recommended that you use the default parameter settings when running the crc-error packet-error-ratio algorithm-parameter realtime-factor command.
